title: >>> DEAD on Arrival
body_text:
ROB AVAKIAN and the Return of the
HIT THE HUMAN
Pregame!
You all know what the
Rimshot Contest
is right? Good. Now, instead of one of those bug infested trash cans or even the colorful, wooden Letsche targets, just take the one thing that's on the receiving end of the most punishment in all of dodgeball: a fellow human being!
It's the return of perhaps the most forgotten mini-game ever - the
Hit the Human
pregame contest! The winner will do battle against a man who has built one hell of a reputation for himself, the legendary
Rob Avakian
! Which gutsy competitor will be battered and bruised even before the action kicks off? And more importantly, will Avakian go on to defeat his unnamed opponent? A must-see event, and it all goes down this Saturday night,
July 14
! And that's not all!
DODGEBALL 100 Captains Drawing
It's the revelation of the fourth and possible fifth captains to see who will headline DODGEBALL 100 on
August 18
. Already, the centennial summer spectacular is shaping up to be the biggest and best as icons Justin Pierce, Kevin Adams, and Kevin Fitzpatrick have all won prior drawings. In this next random selection, the remaining "Top 21" will have another chance to enter the spotlight they helped create.
And just in case you've forgotten, the "Top 21" consists of the following participants:
Alison Bertsch, Chris Adams, Dan Spengeman, Derek Carty, Diana DiBuccio, John Tronolone, Justin Pierce*, Kevin Adams*, Kevin Fitzpatrick*, Kevin Megill, Lauren Freda, Lauren Winston, Lenny Herrera, Mike Krott, Rob Avakian, Ryan Letsche, Ryan McCrorey, Sara DeCuir, Steve Adams, Tom Adams, Valerie Winston.
Do not forget though, you
must
attend DODGEBALL 96 for this once in a lifetime opportunity.
________________________________________
__________________
DODGEBALL 100 Promotional Video Release
An awesome piece of work put together by Dan Spengeman and John Tronolone.
body_html:
ROB AVAKIAN and the Return of the HIT THE HUMAN Pregame!
You all know what the Rimshot Contest is right? Good. Now, instead of one of those bug infested trash cans or even the colorful, wooden Letsche targets, just take the one thing that's on the receiving end of the most punishment in all of dodgeball: a fellow human being!

It's the return of perhaps the most forgotten mini-game ever - the Hit the Human pregame contest! The winner will do battle against a man who has built one hell of a reputation for himself, the legendary Rob Avakian! Which gutsy competitor will be battered and bruised even before the action kicks off? And more importantly, will Avakian go on to defeat his unnamed opponent? A must-see event, and it all goes down this Saturday night, July 14! And that's not all!

DODGEBALL 100 Captains Drawing
It's the revelation of the fourth and possible fifth captains to see who will headline DODGEBALL 100 on August 18. Already, the centennial summer spectacular is shaping up to be the biggest and best as icons Justin Pierce, Kevin Adams, and Kevin Fitzpatrick have all won prior drawings. In this next random selection, the remaining "Top 21" will have another chance to enter the spotlight they helped create.

And just in case you've forgotten, the "Top 21" consists of the following participants: Alison Bertsch, Chris Adams, Dan Spengeman, Derek Carty, Diana DiBuccio, John Tronolone, Justin Pierce*, Kevin Adams*, Kevin Fitzpatrick*, Kevin Megill, Lauren Freda, Lauren Winston, Lenny Herrera, Mike Krott, Rob Avakian, Ryan Letsche, Ryan McCrorey, Sara DeCuir, Steve Adams, Tom Adams, Valerie Winston.

Do not forget though, you must attend DODGEBALL 96 for this once in a lifetime opportunity.

__________________________________________________________


DODGEBALL 100 Promotional Video Release



An awesome piece of work put together by Dan Spengeman and John Tronolone.
